description: Valid examples of list-based loops with delimiters

input.natural_language: Loop through a comma-separated list of names

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:set name="names" value="Alice,Bob,Charlie" />
<q:loop type="list" var="name" items="{names}">
  Hello, {name}!
</q:loop>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Splits by comma, outputs greeting for each name

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:set name="cities" value="Paris;London;Tokyo" />
<q:loop type="list" var="city" items="{cities}" delimiter=";">
  Visit {city}
</q:loop>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Splits by semicolon, outputs each city

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:set name="tags" value="python|javascript|rust" />
<q:loop type="list" var="tag" items="{tags}" delimiter="|">
  ##{tag}
</q:loop>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Splits by pipe, formats each tag with ##
